EmailTemplate.name: SW: Unable to attend PIE or alternative meeting; seek new match
EmailTemplate.subject: SW: Unable to attend PIE or alternative meeting; seek new match
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
{!Contact.Name}'s previously matched SW has been unable to attend a pre KO meeting/the PIE. Staffing are now urgently seeking a new SW for this YP. If needed please contact Sherry Kimball for more information.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever the SW is unable to attend a pre KO meeting with the YP.
